Package org.restsql.security

Contains classes that provide security, such as authorization.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Authorizer
    Authorizes restSQL requests.
    SecurityContext
    Provides user principal and role check method.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SecurityFactory
    Constructs security implementations.
    SqlResourceRolePrivileges
    Models actions available to a role on SQL Resource.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SqlResourceRolePrivileges.Privilege  

Package org.restsql.security Description

Contains classes that provide security, such as authorization.
